ShadowQuest - package ShadowQuest
 
Speed - Variable in class ShadowQuest.Stats
 
Stats - Class in ShadowQuest
Base stats of a unit, they include: - MaxHP: the maximum health the unit has - CoolDown: the minimum time interval between two attacks - Damage: the maximum amount of damage one attack can deal - Speed: the number of pixels the unit can move per update
Stats(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class ShadowQuest.Stats
Create a stats object
